page.title: 18Games Children play.Hoo area
page.content: Pre-school children play games related to their experience-Mothers & Fathers, Doctors & Nurses,Tea Parties-these can be played by as few as 2 children. Playground games vary in name but main-ly appear to be games an almost unlimited number of children can play. DRAC & BULLDOG are variations of the old "Hide & Seek". In Drac the seeker (Drac) has a laser beam which he points at the person found who then turns into a Zombie.The game finishes when all are caught. In Bulldog the seeker has to say "Bulldog 1,2,3 when a person is caught. That person becomes a seeker too and the game finishes when all are caught. "44" is slightly different in that if the seeker is away from base all those already caught can be released by a free child calling "44 Save All". Computer Games & Football are popular.
